entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
